content.raw:
I’ve pushed some significant changes now with a revised approach to factory product management. It includes tests to show that the methodology is working.

I’d say I’m roughly 95% satisfied with this new approach, and I think it’s valuable enough to be worth merging.

The remaining 5% of my potential satisfaction might actually require fundamental changes to the way shared libraries work within the operating system, so we may just have to count that as a loss.
content.html:
I’ve pushed some significant changes now with a revised approach to factory product management. It includes tests to show that the methodology is working.

I’d say I’m roughly 95% satisfied with this new approach, and I think it’s valuable enough to be worth merging.

The remaining 5% of my potential satisfaction might actually require fundamental changes to the way shared libraries work within the operating system, so we may just have to count that as a loss.
